resources.string: Insert batteries in the remote control

Your Fo-Fi ATV remote control comes with a pair of 
 matched batteries of the proper size. Open the back 
 cover of the remote control and insert the batteries,
 observing the correct polarity as indicated inside the 
 battery compartment. 


Reattach the back cover.

When your Fo-Fi ATV powers on, the first screen will allow 
 you to choose a language. All text and dialog within the Fo- 
 Fi application will be displayed in the selected language. 

 Scroll up and down the list and press the button OK on your 
 Fo-Fi ATV remote to choose a language.
Login to Fo-Fi account and activate your Fo-Fi ATV

In order to activate your Fo-Fi ATV, it must be linked to a Fo- 
 Fi account. Your Fo-Fi account keeps track of which Fo-Fi 
 devices you own and allows you to add free and purchase 
 channels from the Fo-Fi Channel Store. 

 Instructions for activating your Fo-Fi ATV will be displayed 
 on your ATV, including an activation code; e.g. “ACV5T7”. 

 Note: Fo-Fi does NOT charge for device activation.
Once connected to the internet, your Fo-Fi ATV will \n download the latest version of Fo-Fi OS software and then \n reboot.
You’re now ready to start watching your favorite shows.

Tips: You can personalize your Fo-Fi ATV by changing your 
 theme or screensaver. You can use the Fo-Fi Channel Store 
 to add new streaming channels, games, themes, 
 screensavers, and other apps.
